name: grover-general-truthtable-qiskit
selectionRule: processable(Oracle, grover-general-truthtable-qiskit) :- Oracle =~ '^[01]+$', atom_length(Oracle, X), X is X /\ (-X).

parameters.name: Oracle
parameters.restriction: Oracle has to be a a binary string of function f in a truth table

parameters.name: assignment
parameters.description: Assignment of Boolean variables such that f evaluates to true
